channel.title: Multiple workstations, stream isolation?
channel.description:
If I have two workstations with TOR_TRANSPROXY=1, are these two workstations stream isolated from each other?
I understand that multiple streams originating from one workstation will not be isolated, but if I understand it correctly, the two workstations should be stream isolated from each other. Is this correct?

item.title: Multiple workstations, stream isolation?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
rob75:

If I have two workstations with TOR_TRANSPROXY=1, are these two workstations stream isolated from each other?

Yes, as per IsolateClientAddr. (See Tor manual.) Only if you are using different Whonix-Workstation IPs which you will do if you follow Whonix documentation.

  • https://2019.www.torproject.org/docs/tor-manual.html.en
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Multiple_Whonix-Workstations

Read full topic
